title: Need help
body: Guys im having problems with my league, every time I try to open up the launcher from a shortcut it keeps saying "PvP.net kernel is not responding windows will tell you when there is a solution" and it only just happened today. I tried redownloading but its taking much longer than before, 1-2% per 15-20min instead of the reg 1-2% per 3-4min. pls help me.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing issue due to League not being configured with the right administrative privileges. I'd recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure League can reach all the software packages it relies on that aren't inside the League folder.

Let me know if this helped.
